name: 死亡骑士
description: 被神秘的古老魔法复活的这些亡灵骑士们，是一段遗失在时间中的传奇历史仅剩的残存者。他们会不惜牺牲凡人的生命来保护曾经属于他们的东西。

wikiSkinData.lore: Dreadknight Nasus serves as keeper of the forgotten texts deep within the catacombs of his Master's labyrinthine library. It is said that within lies the secret of the Dreadknights' undoing, but no living soul has yet verified whether this is truth or fable.

Once a valiant hero, Dreadknight Garen fell to the promise of power great enough to save his land. Now, twisted by the corrupting magic of his Master, he commands the frozen legions in their march upon the living. Only desolation remains in his wake.
